snippet: The decision allows for the appointment of a federal monitor to oversee conditions at the New York City jail complex, along with the addition of thousands of surveillance cameras.
abstract: Federal Judge Laura Taylor Swain approves settlement in lawsuit against New York City over brutality by correction officers at Rikers Island jail complex, paving way for changes to policies on use of force, treatment of teenagers and security cameras.
lead_paragraph: The decision allows for the appointment of a federal monitor to oversee conditions at the New York City jail complex, along with the addition of thousands of surveillance cameras.

headline.print_headline: Judge Approves Settlement of Lawsuit Over Rikers Brutality
headline.main: Judge Approves Settlement of Suit on Rikers Island Brutality
